Reviews.Content: this phone is awesome! easy to function touch screen. Nice large key board. the only thing I dont like is the battery life! but this phone gets a A+

Reviews.Title: LG Xenon does what it has to do...
Reviews.Author: Review
Reviews.Content: The main complaint I have about this phone is that its battery life is not as long as I hoped it to be. Texting with its keyboard is great don't get me wrong but occasionally it wouldn't send text even though there is two bars of service. This is the 5th week since I obtained this phone and now its starting to lag ever so slightly and sometimes it freezes as I am sending a text(just pull the battery out and it'll be fine). There is also a problem where the sent texts that you have will magically appear in the draft box but its not a big annoyance. The phone works great if you are looking to just call and text and good for its price.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price, but not great...
Reviews.Author: Thomas
Reviews.Content: Not a bad phone for the money, but I realized too late that it doesn't have wifi, which is of course my fault. But the responsivity of the screen is not very good, it's quite slow and the construction is not too solid neither. I don't think I will buy again any similar phone, better invest extra $100 to buy better one.

Reviews.Title: Poor service!!!
Reviews.Author: Snappy
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone 2 weeks ago, package it came in was damaged, I ordered a new phone, the phone I got did not look new, it didn't come with a battery,i called cell phone kings and told them what happened, they didn't except any responsibility, they said they would send me a new battery since I never got one, a week later I'm still waiting, I live in wpbfl, cellphone kings is in Miami fl a whole hour a way, yet it's taken over a week to get a battery for this phone. Extremely disappointed never AGAIN!!!
